item.title: York Bins API and Home Assistant
item.description: I have been using Home Assistant to automate various things at home. One of the things I thought would be useful was the ability for the system to inform me of when the next bin collection is, and what sort of collection this would be. Thankfully York Council has an API telling you about their bin collections. This is documented at York Waste Collection Lookup Home Assistant REST Sensors Home Assistant helpfully can use REST sources as a sensor.
